verses.verse: שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear בָ֭נִים <WH1121> ye children מ֣וּסַר <WH4148> the instruction אָ֑ב <WH1> of a father וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבוּ <WH7181> and attend לָדַ֥עַת <WH3045> to know בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> understanding
כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֶ֣קַח <WH3948> doctrine ט֭וֹב <WH2896> you good נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> For I give לָכֶ֑ם תּֽ֝וֹרָתִ֗י <WH8451> ye not my law אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲזֹֽבוּ׃ <WH5800> forsake

כִּי־ <WH3588> When בֵ֭ן <WH1121> son הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> become לְאָבִ֑י <WH1> For I was my father's רַ֥ךְ <WH7390> tender וְ֝יָחִ֗יד <WH3173> and only לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> [beloved] in the sight אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> of my mother

וַיֹּרֵ֗נִי <WH3384> He taught וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> me also and said לִ֗י יִֽתְמָךְ־ <WH8551> retain דְּבָרַ֥י <WH1697> my words לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> unto me Let thine heart שְׁמֹ֖ר <WH8104> keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> my commandments וֶֽחְיֵֽה׃ <WH2421> and live

קְנֵ֣ה <WH7069> Get חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> wisdom קְנֵ֣ה <WH7069> get בִינָ֑ה <WH998> understanding אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> forget וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תֵּ֝֗ט <WH5186> [it] not neither decline מֵֽאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> from the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> of my mouth
אַל־ <WH408> not תַּעַזְבֶ֥הָ <WH5800> Forsake וְתִשְׁמְרֶ֑ךָּ <WH8104> her not and she shall preserve אֱהָבֶ֥הָ <WH157> thee love וְתִצְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5341> her and she shall keep

רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> [is] the principal thing חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> Wisdom קְנֵ֣ה <WH7069> [therefore] get חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all קִ֝נְיָנְךָ֗ <WH7075> and with all thy getting קְנֵ֣ה <WH7069> get בִינָֽה׃ <WH998> get understanding

סַלְסְלֶ֥הָ <WH5549> Exalt וּֽתְרוֹמְמֶ֑ךָּ <WH7311> her and she shall promote תְּ֝כַבֵּ֗דְךָ <WH3513> thee she shall bring thee to honour כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תְחַבְּקֶֽנָּה׃ <WH2263> when thou dost embrace

תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> She shall give לְ֭רֹאשְׁךָ <WH7218> to thine head לִוְיַת־ <WH3880> an ornament חֵ֑ן <WH2580> of grace עֲטֶ֖רֶת <WH5850> a crown תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> of glory תְּמַגְּנֶֽךָּ׃ <WH4042> shall she deliver

שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> O my son וְקַ֣ח <WH3947> and receive אֲמָרָ֑י <WH561> my sayings וְיִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> shall be many לְ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> and the years חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of thy life
בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> thee in the way חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> of wisdom הֹרֵתִ֑יךָ <WH3384> I have taught הִ֝דְרַכְתִּ֗יךָ <WH1869> I have led בְּמַעְגְּלֵי־ <WH4570> paths יֹֽשֶׁר׃ <WH3476> thee in right

בְּֽ֭לֶכְתְּךָ <WH1980> walk לֹא־ <WH3808> not יֵצַ֣ר <WH3334> shall not be straitened צַעֲדֶ֑ךָ <WH6806> thy steps וְאִם־ <WH518> and if תָּ֝ר֗וּץ <WH7323> and when thou runnest לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תִכָּשֵֽׁל׃ <WH3782> thou shalt not stumble

הַחֲזֵ֣ק <WH2388> Take fast hold בַּמּוּסָ֣ר <WH4148> of instruction אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּ֑רֶף <WH7503> let [her] not go נִ֝צְּרֶ֗הָ <WH5341> keep כִּי־ <WH3588> for הִ֥יא <WH1931> she חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> her for she [is] thy life

בְּאֹ֣רַח <WH734> not into the path רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked אַל־ <WH408> not תָּבֹ֑א <WH935> Enter וְאַל־ <WH408> not תְּ֝אַשֵּׁ֗ר <WH833> and go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> not in the way רָעִֽים׃ <WH7451> of evil
פְּרָעֵ֥הוּ <WH6544> Avoid אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּעֲבָר־ <WH5674> it pass בּ֑וֹ שְׂטֵ֖ה <WH7847> not by it turn מֵעָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and וַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> from it and pass away

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִֽ֭שְׁנוּ <WH3462> For they sleep אִם־ <WH518> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יָרֵ֑עוּ <WH7489> not except they have done mischief וְֽנִגְזְלָ֥ה <WH1497> is taken away שְׁ֝נָתָ֗ם <WH8142> and their sleep אִם־ <WH518> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot [יִכְשֹׁולוּ כ] (יַכְשִֽׁילוּ׃ <WH3782> bereave ק)
כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לָ֭חֲמוּ <WH3898> For they eat לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> the bread רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> of wickedness וְיֵ֖ין <WH3196> the wine חֲמָסִ֣ים <WH2555> of violence יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> and drink

וְאֹ֣רַח <WH734> But the path צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> of the just כְּא֣וֹר <WH216> light נֹ֑גַהּ <WH5051> [is] as the shining הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> more וָ֝א֗וֹר <WH215> that shineth עַד־ <WH5704> until נְכ֥וֹן <WH3559> and more unto the perfect הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> day

דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked כָּֽאֲפֵלָ֑ה <WH653> [is] as darkness לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָ֝דְע֗וּ <WH3045> they know בַּמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> what יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃ <WH3782> not at what they stumble פ
בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son לִדְבָרַ֣י <WH1697> to my words הַקְשִׁ֑יבָה <WH7181> attend לַ֝אֲמָרַ֗י <WH561> unto my sayings הַט־ <WH5186> incline אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <WH241> thine ear
אַל־ <WH408> not יַלִּ֥יזוּ <WH3868> Let them not depart מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> from thine eyes שָׁ֝מְרֵ֗ם <WH8104> keep בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> them in the midst לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> of thine heart

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> For they [are] life הֵ֭ם <WH1992> who לְמֹצְאֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4672> unto those that find וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> to all בְּשָׂר֥וֹ <WH1320> to all their flesh מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> them and health

מִֽכָּל־ <WH3605> all מִ֭שְׁמָר <WH4929> with all diligence נְצֹ֣ר <WH5341> Keep לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> thy heart כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> from תּוֹצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> for out of it [are] the issues חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of life

הָסֵ֣ר <WH5493> Put away מִ֭מְּךָ <WH4480> at עִקְּשׁ֣וּת <WH6143> from thee a froward פֶּ֑ה <WH6310> mouth וּלְז֥וּת <WH3891> and perverse שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> lips הַרְחֵ֥ק <WH7368> put far מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> at
עֵ֭ינֶיךָ <WH5869> Let thine eyes לְנֹ֣כַח <WH5227> right on יַבִּ֑יטוּ <WH5027> look וְ֝עַפְעַפֶּ֗יךָ <WH6079> and let thine eyelids יַיְשִׁ֥רוּ <WH3474> look straight נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5048> front

פַּ֭לֵּס <WH6424> Ponder מַעְגַּ֣ל <WH4570> the path רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <WH7272> of thy feet וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> and all דְּרָכֶ֥יךָ <WH1870> and let all thy ways יִכֹּֽנוּ׃ <WH3559> be established אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תֵּט־ <WH5186> afternoon
יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> not to the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> nor to the left הָסֵ֖ר <WH5493> remove רַגְלְךָ֣ <WH7272> thy foot מֵרָֽע׃ <WH7451> from evil
